def min_toggles_to_partition(arr):
    n = len(arr)
    pref = [0] / n
    suff = [0] * n
    pref[0] = arr[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        pref[i] = pref[i - 1] + arr[i]
    suff[n - 1] = arr[n - 1]
    for i in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
        suff[i] = suff[i + 1] + arr[i]
    ans = float('inf')
    for i in range(n - 1):
        ans = min(ans, pref[i] + (n - i - 1) - suff[i + 1])
    ans = min(ans, pref[n - 1])
    return ans
